Name: How about the poster template?
Description:
The poster should be set in a landscape style orientation, and all information (including the text, data, photos, and figures need to be designed to appear in one window/ slide). 
The poster size must be 90 cm width x 50 cm height. 
You must submit your poster in either a PDF or JPEG format.  

Essential information to include in the poster: 
- Poster should be written ONLY in English. 
- Title of the poster should be brief and match with the submitted abstract.
 - Name of all authors, including their institutions/ affiliations. 
- Arial font must be used throughout the poster with such clarity that it could be read from 1.5 meters distance.
 - Keep only 2-3 colors as this would be a formal scientific poster presentation. 

Example:

Name: Where should I submit my poster?
Description:
If your abstract is selected, you will be contacted by the committee to submit either a poster or a PPT file. 

If you want and need to submit a poster, the committee will contact you further through email.
